data.title: Media Mogul Rupert Murdoch to marry for fifth time at the age of 93. Know about bride and wedding plan
data.meta_description: Media Mogul Rupert Murdoch was previously married to former flight attendant Patricia Booker, journalist Anna Murdoch, entrepreneur Wendi Deng, and Jerry Hall, the model and ex-wife of Mick Jagger. Elena Zhukova will be his fifth wife.
data.text:
Synopsis

Media Mogul Rupert Murdoch was previously married to former flight attendant Patricia Booker, journalist Anna Murdoch, entrepreneur Wendi Deng, and Jerry Hall, the model and ex-wife of Mick Jagger. Elena Zhukova will be his fifth wife.

Nonagenarian billionaire and media mogul Rupert Murdoch will marry again, this time at the age of 93 and for the fifth time. According to the 'New York Times', Murdoch has popped up the question to 67-year-old retired molecular biologist Elena Zhukova, whom he started dating last year. Zhukova is the mother of Russian Dasha Zhukova, the former wife of Russian oligarch Roman Abramovich.

Earlier in 2023, the former Fox chief got engaged to retired dental hygienist Ann Lesley Smith, but abruptly ended the relationship. Murdoch divorced Jerry Hall, the model and ex-wife of Mick Jagger in the summer of 2022. His third wife Wendi Deng was of Chinese origin, she introduced him to Zukhova.

Invitations sent

The 'New York Times' has reported that the wedding will take place in June this year at Murdoch’s California vineyard and estate, Moraga and the invitations have been sent.

The billionaire business tycoon retired as the head of his business empire last year before his son Lachlan took over the reins fully. Murdoch got the emeritus role.

Murdoch steps down as chief

Murdoch's marriage is not likely to impact his business empire as it is controlled through a family trust. The shares of the trust have been divided among his four eldest children — one with his first wife, Patricia Booker, and the other three with his second wife, Anna Murdoch Mann.

FAQs:

Who did Rupert Murdoch marry till now?

Rupert Murdoch was previously married to former flight attendant Patricia Booker, journalist Anna Murdoch, entrepreneur Wendi Deng, and Jerry Hall, the model and ex-wife of Mick Jagger. Elena Zhukova will be his fifth wife.

When will Rupert Murdoch marry?

Rupert Murdoch's wedding will take place in June this year at his California vineyard and estate, Moraga and the invitations have been sent.
